about_the_game:
Discover 1114: Robin Hood Survivor - minimalistic gameplay mixed with intense decision making. Enjoy this 2d roguelike bullet heaven game in the same style as Vampire Survivors. But with a BIG twist. How long can Robin, Little John, Friar Tuck, and Maid Marian survive in the forest? Collect golden coins to allow you to upgrade, preparing you for your inevitable next attempt to defeat an unjust royal family.

Help Robin to recruit his 'Merry Men' to steal from the rich, and give to the poor.
detailed_description:
Discover 1114: Robin Hood Survivor - minimalistic gameplay mixed with intense decision making. Enjoy this 2d roguelike bullet heaven game in the same style as Vampire Survivors. But with a BIG twist. How long can Robin, Little John, Friar Tuck, and Maid Marian survive in the forest? Collect golden coins to allow you to upgrade, preparing you for your inevitable next attempt to defeat an unjust royal family.

Help Robin to recruit his 'Merry Men' to steal from the rich, and give to the poor.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave) or later
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel x64 64bit
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit

name: 1114: Robin Hood Survivors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Help Robin Hood and his Merry Men to defeat Bad King John in a bullet heaven pixel adventure. 1114:Robin Hood Survivors is a casual, rogue-lite, top-down game where your choices are extremely important. Fight hundreds of forest enemies on screen at once.
